CustomField.description: Informational field used for VAT customers when Avalara Tax calculation is enabled. The value entered here populates the Customer VAT Number field on the Avalara transaction.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Informational field used for VAT customers when Avalara Tax calculation is enabled. The value entered here populates the Customer VAT Number field on the Avalara transaction.
CustomField.label: VAT Business Identification Number
